title: North Italy Eco-Luxury Retreat with Fine Dining, Mountain-View Pool & Wellness Spa
description:
Nestled in the Alpine town of Merano, Villa Eden is a historic 19th-century villa featuring just 25 suites inspired by the elegance of the Belle Ã‰poque. Surrounded by a sprawling, century-old park with majestic cedar trees and a serene lily-covered pond, this property has welcomed the likes of Barbara Streisand and Diego Maradona, earning its place as a member of the Leading Hotels of the World.

The resort is a masterpiece of holistic indulgence. The Marvel Spa provides bespoke wellness experiences with deep massages and nourishing treatments, while the innovative Tasting Room - helmed by culinary maestro Marcello Corrado - turns dining into a sensory journey. An organic garden, private park and spectacular pool make every moment an encounter with absolute luxury.

Perched in the province of Bolzano, Villa Eden is an oasis of rejuvenation embraced by the majestic South Tyrolean peaks, rolling vineyards and the Adige Valley. Whether dining al fresco on the terrace, exploring the cultural treasures of Merano or wandering the two-hectare private park, its location is a carefully orchestrated symphony of natural beauty.
